Title: Includes bonus in the definition of wages for purposes of the labor law
Summary: Includes bonus in the definition of wages for purposes of the labor law when the formula under which a bonus is determined is available to the employer or when the amount of a bonus has been declared; relates to the forfeit of wages.
LawCode: Amd ยง190, add ยง193-a, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to including bonus compensation in the definition of wages and forfeit of wages
